DOC.brief_summary: Background : Creatinine ( Crn ) concentration use assess renal function via calculation GFR ( Glomerular Filtration Rate ) . By RIFLE ( Risk , Injury , Failure , Loss , End Stage Kidney Disease ) criterion , acute kidney injury ( AKI ) acute renal failure ( ARF ) define two-fold three-fold increase serum Crn , respectively . Crn breakdown product protein circulate creatine , generally benign product present serum . Creatine nutritional supplement available since 1993 , widely use among athlete today . Methods : In IRB approve , blind crossover trial , 25 human volunteer ingest 2 creatine supplement determine associate statistically significant increase serum Crn clinically significant increase serum Crn degree associate AKI ARF . Urine sample also collect examine excretion pattern ingested sample . Participants ingest 10 gm creatine ethyl ester ( CEE ) creatine monohydrate ( CrM ) serum Crn assay 0 , 1 , 2 , 3 , 4 , 5 24 hour . Urinary Crn level assay 0 , 1.5 , 3 , 5 24 hour . Exclusion factor history renal disease use creatine within last month . Statistical analysis perform Wilcoxon Matched-Pair Signed Ranks Test descriptive summary statistic perform .
